attributes.action: Stop the proposed closure of Cheswardine Primary School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to strongly object to the proposed closure of Cheswardine Primary School. Cheswardine Primary School is a warm, friendly and very successful school, it is at the very heart of our community. We have a young team of dedicated staff who along with the fantastic children make this school the place to be. Cheswardine School has achieved silver Artsmark award, International Schools Status, healthy School status, and investors in people award. We have a wonderful Pre-School on site who work closely with the School to help Children intergrate into School life, this proposal will have a direct affect on them, our local shop, the Church, village hall and the various village groups. Please help us stop this Proposal.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition already on the site: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Save-Ches-School/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
